attributes.action: Better support and training for teachers/LSA's in the mainstream schooling system
attributes.additional_details: Children don't choose to have special needs, it chooses them. Better education and training should be available to teachers/LSA'S who work in the mainstream schooling system to help provide better support and education to our children who have special needs. My son who has High functioning Autism  has been let down in some many ways by un educated Teachers/LSA's who work in main stream schools! Enough is Enough our kids deserve better.
